headline: What’s Next for Cable Giant Comcast After Charter-Cox Merger
summary: Comcast, a recent Barron’s stock pick, is still focused on spinning off assets. A deal between rivals won’t change that.

raw.headline: What’s Next for Cable Giant Comcast After Charter-Cox Merger
raw.summary: Comcast, a recent Barron’s stock pick, is still focused on spinning off assets. A deal between rivals won’t change that.

headline: Verizon dumped DEI. Then regulators cleared its $20 billion Frontier deal
summary: Three hours after Verizon (VZ) announced it was shuttering all of its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) programs, the Federal Communications Commission cleared the telecom giant’s $20 billion purchase of Texan company Frontier Communications (FYBR).

raw.headline: Verizon dumped DEI. Then regulators cleared its $20 billion Frontier deal
raw.summary: Three hours after Verizon (VZ) announced it was shuttering all of its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) programs, the Federal Communications Commission cleared the telecom giant’s $20 billion purchase of Texan company Frontier Communications (FYBR).

headline: Wireless, Cable and Satellite Stocks Q1 Earnings Review: Comcast (NASDAQ:CMCSA) Shines
summary: As the Q1 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the wireless, cable and satellite industry, including Comcast (NASDAQ:CMCSA) and its peers.
